starvationevasion.client.GUI.DraftLayout

Class DraftLayout

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.Node
      • javafx.scene.Parent
        • javafx.scene.layout.Region
          • javafx.scene.layout.Pane
            • javafx.scene.layout.GridPane
              • starvationevasion.client.GUI.DraftLayout.DraftLayout
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget

    public class DraftLayout
extends javafx.scene.layout.GridPane
    The DraftLayout class is responsible for the layout the GUI displays during the draft phase of the game It holds the GUI elements which let the player view the visualizer, graphs, data about the food products, the player's hand, the played cards, action buttons, draft status, summary bar, and the player's deck and discard pile
